case.title: Curvy ebony lady looking for the right connection. - 25 (London)
case.text:
Hi guys,
So I've decided to give this site a chance and see if I can find a nice gentleman who I can connect with & hopefully date on a long term basis. I'm not looking for "fun" or anything casual so please don't even bother messaging me if you're after that. I'm 5"6, milk chocolate complexion and quite curvy with the right proportions. I live in London, professional and enjoy a variety of things from watching sport to bars or restaurants. My ideal partner is someone who's happy with their life, over 30, far from needy & quite self sufficient.
